message: Let's split it 60-40, it's a fair start!
Meet me halfway, no need to be greedy!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't expect too much more!
You're getting desperate, I'm taking a bigger share!
You're pushing your luck, Bob! I'm taking back the reins!
You're getting low, I'm making my move!
Let's call a truce, Bob! We're almost there, let's split it 50-50!
